content:
the yellow lines show a whole unused column not needed at all

Clock the "Message list display options" button at the very right of the largely empty toolbar - Hide Message List Header

I can't seem to make the main display have bigger fonts.

See https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-115-supernova-faq#w_why-are-thunderbird-115s-fonts-so-large-so-small
